General.Name: TOTVS S.A
General.Description: TOTVS S.A. engages in provision of business management systems and platforms and related services in Brazil. The company develops and sells management software, and productivity and collaboration platforms. It also offers implementation, consulting, assistance, maintenance, e-commerce, and mobility services. The company provides a data intelligence platform that supply insights through real time monitoring of the behavior of a wide audience on the internet to optimize customers' sales. TOTVS S.A. was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in São Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Avenida Braz Leme, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 1000
